content:
Today I chose PR #9973 for discussion!

feat: polynomials formed by lists

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Originally by @Yakov Pechersky in mathlib3; probably reasonably easy to resurrect if anyone is interested, but I won't.
